projects.name: Semi-Automatic Weapons Without A Background Check Can Be Just A Click Away
projects.notes: To understand the widespread availability of assault weapons in the U.S., the gray market is a source of valuable data. I helped identify the story idea and data source, [developed a scrape](http://blog.apps.npr.org/2016/06/17/scraping-tips.html)r to liberate the data and coordinated the graphics development for the final piece.
